title: Mochi 1 Preview: Open Source Mochi 1 Video Generation with High-Fidelity Motion
description: Experience state-of-the-art Mochi 1 video generation with exceptional motion quality and prompt adherence, powered by our 10B parameter Mochi 1 AsymmDiT architecture
keywords: Mochi 1 Preview, Mochi 1 AI, Genmo Mochi 1, Mochi 1 AI Video Preview, Text to Video AI Mochi 1, Next-Gen Video Creation, Mochi 1 Video Generator, Mochi 1 Video Technology, Advanced AI Animation, Visual Storytelling with Mochi 1
videoDescription: Explore groundbreaking open-source Mochi 1 video generation powered by our novel Mochi 1 Asymmetric Diffusion Transformer
feature1Description: Industry-leading Mochi 1 motion quality through our 10B parameter Mochi 1 diffusion model with strong prompt adherence in preliminary evaluation
feature2Description: Built on the novel Mochi 1 Asymmetric Diffusion Transformer (AsymmDiT) architecture, freely available under Apache 2.0 license
feature3Description: Featuring our open-source Mochi 1 VAE that causally compresses videos to 128x smaller size with 8x8 spatial and 6x temporal compression
feature4Description: Streamlined text processing with Mochi 1's single T5-XXL language model and optimized visual reasoning capacity
feature5Description: Mochi 1's joint attention to text and visual tokens with dedicated MLP layers for each modality and non-square QKV projection
feature6Description: Simple, hackable Mochi 1 architecture with comprehensive documentation and community support
step1Description: Clone the Mochi 1 repository and install dependencies using uv package manager
step2Description: Set Mochi 1 model directory, CFG scale, and seed values for controlled generation
step3Description: Run Mochi 1 inference through Gradio UI or command line interface
review1: The Mochi 1 motion quality and prompt adherence set new standards for open-source video generation.
review2: The simple, hackable Mochi 1 architecture makes it perfect for research and experimentation.
review3: Impressive results with the efficient Mochi 1 single T5-XXL language model approach.
faq1Answer: Mochi 1 represents a significant advancement in open-source video generation, featuring a 10B parameter Mochi 1 diffusion model with novel AsymmDiT architecture, offering high-fidelity motion and strong prompt adherence while being completely open source.
faq2Question: What are the technical specifications of Mochi 1?
faq2Answer: Mochi 1 generates 480p videos using a 10B parameter model with 8x8 spatial and 6x temporal compression. The Mochi 1 model requires 4 H100 GPUs for inference and uses a single T5-XXL for prompt encoding.
faq3Question: How does the Mochi 1 architecture work?
faq3Answer: The Mochi 1 AsymmDiT architecture efficiently processes prompts alongside compressed video tokens, using multi-modal self-attention with separate MLP layers for each modality and non-square QKV projections for reduced memory requirements.
faq4Question: What are the current limitations of Mochi 1?
faq4Answer: The current Mochi 1 research preview is limited to 480p resolution, may show minor warping in extreme motion cases, and is optimized for photorealistic rather than animated content.

guideTitle: Master the Art of Mochi 1 Video Prompts
guideDescription: Learn how to create compelling prompts for generating impressive Mochi 1 AI videos with Mochi 1
bestPracticesTitle: Best Practices for Writing Mochi 1 Prompts
practiceSpecificDesc: Include detailed descriptions of scenes, movements, and atmosphere you want to create with Mochi 1.
practiceSceneDesc: Describe the environment, lighting, and time of day to establish the right mood for your Mochi 1 video.
practiceMotionDesc: Specify how elements should move and interact within the Mochi 1 scene.
practiceAtmosphereDesc: Include sensory details like sounds, lighting, and weather conditions for your Mochi 1 video.
example1Short: SURREAL SKY KINGDOM IN A GLASS GLOBE
example1Long: Within the confines of a massive glass globe, floating high above a vast, turbulent sea, lies a surreal kingdom in the sky. Jagged cliffs rise from the clouds, dotted with ethereal castles connected by delicate, glowing bridges. The sky is a swirl of colours, a sunset that never ends, bathing the world in soft pinks, purples, and gold.
example2Title: Rural Village at Sunrise with Mochi 1
example2Long: A quiet rural village awakens as the first light of dawn breaks over the horizon. The soft glow of the sun gently illuminates the rooftops of small stone cottages, casting long shadows across fields of golden wheat. Birds begin to chirp, and a thin mist lingers just above the ground.
example3Short: CITY STREET MARKET IN THE EARLY MORNING
example3Long: In the heart of a bustling city, a street market comes to life in the early hours of the morning. Vendors set up their stalls, displaying fresh produce, colourful fruits, vegetables, and local goods. The camera pans across the market, capturing the sounds of conversations.
structure1Desc: Start with the location and time of day for your Mochi 1 video
structure2Desc: Describe the key subjects and their actions for Mochi 1
structure2Example: Example: "A group of construction workers carefully move across steel beams..."
structure3Desc: Add details about lighting, weather, and mood for your Mochi 1 video
structure3Example: Example: "The warm afternoon sun casts long shadows..."
structure4Desc: Specify how the Mochi 1 scene should be captured
structure4Example: Example: "The camera slowly pans across the scene..."
proTip1: Create custom prompts for specific Mochi 1 outputs rather than relying on prompt refinement
proTip2: Focus on natural movements and realistic scenarios for better Mochi 1 results
proTip3: Include camera movement descriptions to guide the Mochi 1 video flow
proTip4: Generate one Mochi 1 video at a time for optimal results
proTip5: Test both simple and detailed prompts to find what works best for your Mochi 1 needs

payAsYouGo.name: Pay As You Go with Mochi 1

freePlan.question: How does the free Mochi 1 plan work?
freePlan.answer: You get 3 free Mochi 1 videos to try out our service. No credit card required. After using your free Mochi 1 credits, you can purchase additional Mochi 1 videos at $0.9 each or upgrade to a Mochi 1 subscription plan for better rates.

exceeding.question: What happens if I exceed my monthly Mochi 1 limit?
exceeding.answer: You'll be charged the overage rate for your Mochi 1 plan. Basic plan users pay $0.8 per additional Mochi 1 video, while Pro plan users pay $0.6 per additional Mochi 1 video.

rollover.question: Do unused Mochi 1 videos roll over?
rollover.answer: No, Mochi 1 video quotas reset at the beginning of each billing cycle. However, credits purchased in the Mochi 1 Pay As You Go plan never expire.
